review: Sadly I have yet to watch an entire hour of television via Netflix without the feed dropping. Confusingly enough, the error message reads that I 'may not be connected to the internet,' yet when I check the setting on my Stick it reads as connected with 'very good' signal strength. I end up having to reset the Stick to continue to stream.I'll keep it for another week, but if it continues to be a problem it will go back.
author: Stephen R. Peluso
